harmonicAnalysis.analysis: The tune opens with a standard ii-V-I progression.
Unexpected modulation to the relative minor.

commonTraps: Rushing the tempo during the B section.
Ignoring the dynamic shift in bar 12.
proTips: Try tritone substitution on the dominant chords in the A section.

goldenLick.notation: C D E F G A B c
goldenLick.description: A scalar run to connect the measure.
